author: slava77
body:
this is a catch-up improvement to #21775 to reserve for the lepton size as well when it's used.

I also played a bit with the std::move in ```fjClusterSeq_ = ClusterSequencePtr( new fastjet::ClusterSequence( fjInputs, *fjJetDefinition_ ) );```, as it seemed to improve the memory peak at first, but after re-sampling/rerunning a few times I could not see a significant improvement.
title: catch-up update to #21775 in JetFlavourClustering
